note.p: English-born newspaper proprietor in Australia. Became junior partner in the Melbourne Argus newspaper in 1857. Returned to England and lived in London.

Aust. dict. biog., s.v. Edward Wilson; Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/26/47/26); England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 May 2013); London, England, births and baptisms, 1813–1906 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 May 2013).
